alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Clay (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 19 at 10:21PM EDT until April 20 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY ACROSS PORTIONS OF THE EAST TN VALLEY AND SOUTHWEST NC... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR PORTIONS OF EAST TENNESSEE AND SOUTHWEST NORTH CAROLINA... * TIMING...Noon EDT Thursday to 8 PM EDT Thursday. * WIND...South to southwest winds 10 to 15 mph, with occasional gusts of 20 to 25 mph. * HUMIDITY...Minimum relative humidity values in the upper teens to low 20s. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are possible. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
